title: How to select an instructor for effective employee training
description: Many companies invest a lot of money in employee training, but they do not actually get much benefit. Why do companies invest a lot of money in training but do not actually get much benefit?

title: Mistakes Management Strategy
description: Let's see how organizations manage mistakes and the impact of strategies for mistakes on the team.

title: The Learning Method of Programmers
description: Let's see what learning methods programmers can use when learning a new language.

title: Extracting Expertise from Experts through Cognitive Task Analysis
description: Let's see how to extract expertise from experts through cognitive task analysis.

title: Deliberate practice to become an expert
description: You can not become an expert by repeating the same thing for a lifetime. To become an expert, deliberate practice is required.

title: [Essay] Learning methods to survive in the AI era
description: Let's see what learning methods are needed to create a career that AI cannot replace in the AI era.

title: [Essay] Learning Frame and Execution Frame
description: Let's see what learning frame and execution frame are, and find out which frame is right for me.

title: [Essay] Exponential Teams
description: Let's maximize the productivity of the team by forming an exponential team.

title: [Essay] Deliberate Practice
description: Just spending 10,000 hours on the same thing doesn't improve your skills or make you an expert. You need to engage in deliberate practice to improve your skills and become an expert.

title: [Essay] Illusion of Master
description: There is no master in this world who will make me a master.

title: [Essay] Study in School and Society
description: The learning in school and the learning in society where we will live in the future are different.

title: [Essay] Working Together
description: We are more accustomed to doing things alone than together. However, it is difficult to make a big impact on society alone.
